attributes.action: Give the English the vote for independance from Scotland and the rest of the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Instead of waiting for the Scottish to have a vote on whether they want to be part of a United Kingdom, part run from Westminster or become a full, independant sovereign state. Why can't the English have the vote for independance from Scotland, Wales and NI, and lets stop funding these countries, who inherently hate the English for colonsing them hundreds of years ago.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
